BookPg500.4: A class that contains abstract methods must be ________.
BookPg500.3:
An abstract class cannot be instantiated using the new operator, but you
can still define its constructors, which are invoked in the constructors 
of its subclasses.
BookPg500.2: An abstract method cannot be contained in a _________ class.
BookPg496:
An abstract class can contain abstract methods, which are implemented in
______________.
BookPg498:
A class that contains abstract methods must be defined
as __________.
BookPg500: An abstract method cannot be contained in a ___________ class.
